des: Make your perfect pizza with this skill. Make pizza with step-by-step steps! Don't wait to relish perfect pizza. Enable this skill and make this non-fail pizza recipe (this recipe may not be as tasty as it should if you don't listen to the recipe carefully).
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
